name: Staking Your Life on a Prank
desc: As a member of the Three Fairies of Light, this unit can perform a triangle attack with her other two compatriots.
components: 100 if len([x.nid for x in get_allies_within_distance(unit2.position) if has_skill(x, 'Staking_Your_Life_on_a_Prank')]) == 3 else 0
